Package bcu.s17123433.adventure.effects

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Effect
    Every effect from this interface
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DoAction
    Effect to perform action of given name.
    DropItem
    Effect to remove item from player's inventory to the current location.
    GoDirection
    Effect to allow player to change location by moving, in a given direction, to a neighbour of their current location.
    LookItem
    Effect that allows the player to inspect items
    LookLocation
    Effect to allow player to inspect current location.
    Message
    Effect to print a message.
    Quit
    Effect to quit game by throwing a custom QuitException.
    ShowInventory
    Effect to show items in player's inventory.
    TakeItem
    Effect to pick up item from the player's current location to their inventory.
